Uses of Class
javax.money.convert.ConversionContextBuilder

Packages that use ConversionContextBuilder 
Package Description
javax.money.convert
Defines the monetary currency conversion API.

  • Uses of ConversionContextBuilder in javax.money.convert

    Methods in javax.money.convert that return ConversionContextBuilder 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static ConversionContextBuilder ConversionContextBuilder.create​(ProviderContext context, RateType rateType)
    Create a new Builder, hereby using the given ConversionContext's values as defaults.
    static ConversionContextBuilder ConversionContextBuilder.of()
    Creates a new ConversionContextBuilder instance.
    static ConversionContextBuilder ConversionContextBuilder.of​(ConversionContext conversionContext)
    Creates a new ConversionContextBuilder instance.
    ConversionContextBuilder ConversionContextBuilder.setRateType​(RateType rateType)
    Set the historic value.
    ConversionContextBuilder ConversionContext.toBuilder()
    Creates a conversion query builder with the context data from this context instance.
